This website is AudioEye enabled and is being optimized for accessibility. To open the AudioEye Toolbar, press "shift + =". Some assistive technologies may require the use of a passthrough function before this keystroke. For more information, activate the button labeled “Explore your accessibility options”.

![Dieter Schindler Headshot 2022](https://www.basalt.net/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=4885)

# Dieter Schindler

 

[Town Council](https://www.basalt.net/Directory.aspx?DID=11)  
Title: Town Councilor  
Phone: 773-578-7702  
[Email](mailto:Dieter.Schindler@basalt.net)

My name is Dieter Schindler. I've been in Basalt for six years with my wife Michelle (a local lawyer) and daughter Genevieve (10) who attends Basalt elementary school. We love the town and community. Since moving here, I’ve worked for Aspen Skiing Company and currently am a General Manager in the Mountain Dining division. I have a degree in political science, but my passion is hospitality and people. Both personally and professionally, I strive to listen, understand perspectives, and solve problems. As our families roots grow deeper in our community, I hope to help our Town Council move to a thoughtful, vibrant and sustainable future.

Dieter was elected to office in April, 2022.  His term expires April, 2026.
